title: AIIMS Nagpur Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 108 Senior Resident Posts
description: All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS) Nagpur has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 108 Senior Resident Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MS/ MD, DNB can apply for the AIIMS Nagpur Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the deadline. For more details, visit ...
